name: Stop the Spark on the Bark
name_original: Stop the Spark on the Bark
description:
Created for the GMTK2020 game jam, themed _Out of control_.

Made in collaboration with MentosMonkey

It's a game inspired by Into the Breach, but we didn't have time to implement any controllable characters. It's a turn based strategy game, focused around controlling a forest fire. You have several actions available, that can be used to stop the spread of the fire. Click the button on the left >> to advance to the next turn.

Good luck!
